#summary The architecture of the system

= Introduction =

The framework of the system must be flexible enough that it can essentially support 'plug n play' modules. For example, while this project is called golfassist, the framework can also be used to support applications for:

  * travel
  * cycling
  * cricket
  * any other distance sport
